name: Coastal Pacific Aviation Ltd.
about: Coastal Pacific Aviation Ltd., established in 1973, is a premier flight school in British Columbia, Canada. With a rich history of providing high-quality flight training since 1974, the school has evolved into an unparalleled institution where dedication meets innovation. Our fleet includes 16 Cessna 172s, 2 Piper PA-30s, a Diamond DA-42, and a Cessna 185 for float plane training. Our instructors are highly skilled and educationally robust, ensuring students receive comprehensive flight and educational training. We offer various programs, including Aviation Degrees, Accelerated Professional Pilot Programs, and certifications from Private Pilot License to Group 1 (Multi Engine) Instrument Rating. At Coastal Pacific Aviation, we are committed to precision, education, and aviation mastery, building confident and skilled aviators. Join us for a journey that goes beyond the skies.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating"]
